description: Here it is much like the rest of this small portion of this fiery
realm.  Bursts of flame and molten lava streak the lands.  A large
pool of lava bubbles nearby, radiating enough heat to bake an ox in 5
seconds flat.  A shimmering sphere hovers above you.
19233.name: Realm of the Demon Lord of Fire

description: This stone corridor is dusty and cobwebs adorn the dark corners and
crevices.  Sconces holding torches line the hallway dimly lighting your way.
An alcove lies on your left and right, but seems to dark to see anything
inside.
19217.name: The {mHall {xof the {yD{8ea{yd{x

description: The west side of the hall is no different than the rest.  Broken pews and
ceiling flakes litter the floor.  North of here is a dais with an altar upon
it.
19209.name: Hall of Ceremonies

description: Here it seems the canopy has let a bit of light through and there are no
briar patches or thorn bushes.  Matter of fact, it looks like a decent place
to rest in this overgrown hell.  A small smear of char marks the ground
where it looks as if someone has had a campfire at one time.
19347.name: A Small Wooded Clearing

description: You stand in the middle of a vast desolate wasteland.  Sky above
you is a shade of gray, extending in all directions, never changing
color.  The ground beneath you is a slightly darker shade of gray,
extending in all directions, never changing color.
19242.name: Realm of the Demon Lord of Death

description: You are now crawling down a 20 foot diameter hole dug into the earth by
someone...  Or something.  The dirt walls are moist and dirt crumbles off as
you climb downward.  Rain from the storm above pours over the edge above you
and runs down the walls.
19380.name: A Large Dirt Hole

description: You stand in the middle of a raging ice storm.  Strong winds pelt
you with chunks of ice, painfully stinging your face.  It is quite
hard to travel through the knee deep snow and ice.  Your vision is
blinded by the swirling snow and frozen rain limiting your vision to
mere inches.  The subarctic temperatures begin to set into your bones,
slowing your progress.
19234.name: Realm of the Demon Lord of Frost

description: You continue treading this tiny animal trail.  What you expect to find
you are not sure, but somehow it seems better than sitting in an inn and
downing a few ales.  What dangerous beast can you find on an animal trail
this small anyways?
19345.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: This stone room is an ancient and long forgotten place. Forgotten for
a good reason. The tortured souls of long dead priests fly about this
room, trapped for all eternity, damned for the rest of their existence.
The pitiful wails and pleas of the souls almost brings you to tears.
"Please free us from this damnation. If you cannot kill us then you will
join in our misery! "
19252.name: Chamber Of Souls

description: You have crawled into the ground beneath the tombstone of some unknown
being.  Why would you do such a thing, defile anothers grave.  That's just
so rude.
19383.name: Below A {8Tombstone{0

description: This room is lit only by the light you carry.  The walls are covered with
cobwebs and the floors are cover with dust.  Small insects crawl about, and
the place smells of death.
19213.name: A {rTomb {xof the {yD{8ea{yd{x

description: You wander deeper through this mangled carcass that was once a forest.
Great trees have been uprooted, some snapped in half even.  The canopy that
kept the forest so dark is nothing more than a few empty branches.  The sky
overhead is {8overcast{0 with dark storm clouds.  {#Lightning{0 arcs across
the sky and to the ground.  As you walk your feet sink into the charred
earth, which has turned to mud from the constant {^r{7a{^i{7n{0 from above.
19367.name: Barren Forest

description: You have foolishly climbed down into the lair of a gigantic snake-like
reptilian creature.  Deep blue band-like scales cover its body.  It begins
moving its dozen legs, half walking, half slithering towards you with a
hungry look on its crocodilian head.
19382.name: Bottom of a Large Hole

description: The animal trail continues to weave and wind its way through large oak
trees and deep overgrowth.  Nothing larger than a rabbit or beaver could
navigate this trail without creating a much wider trail to travel.
19350.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: You stand in the middle of a raging ice storm.  Strong winds pelt
you with chunks of ice, painfully stinging your face.  It is quite
hard to travel through the knee deep snow and ice.  Your vision is
blinded by the swirling snow and frozen rain limiting your vision to
mere inches.  The subarctic temperatures begin to set into your bones,
slowing your progress.
19235.name: Realm of the Demon Lord of Frost

description: You have steered off of the animal trail and have found yourself standing
in a huge patch of briars.  The thorns pick at your clothes and poke at your
flesh.  It is quite the uncomfortable place to be for more than a few
minutes.
19342.name: A Thick Patch Of Briars

description: An unmarked tombstone is all that marks this grave plot.
19335.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: This room is lit only by the light you carry.  The walls are covered with
cobwebs and the floors are cover with dust.  Small insects crawl about, and
the place smells of death.
19219.name: A {rTomb {xof the {yD{8ea{yd{x

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Eldain the Chaotic{0
19323.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: You stand surrounded by fire and heat of all kinds.  Lava pumps
from small craters in the ground, oozing in all directions.  Jets of
searing flame spew forth randomly, sending bursts of fire everywhere.
The ground beneath your feet is cracked and dry.  The heat is
unbearable and you begin to feel a bit dizzy.
19230.name: Realm of the Demon Lord of Fire

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Umbarin the Wild Mage{0
{6Seeker of Anarchy, Chaos, Confusion{0
19334.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: Behind this tapestry is a small niche.  What possibly possessed you to
come back here?
19202.name: Behind the Tapestry

description: You have entered the home of a very pissed off carrion crawler.  It
immediately clammers toward you with its eight tiny, poison-filled tentacles
waving wildly.  This hole reeks of dead carcass and rotted flesh, you almost
vomit as it begins its attack upon you.  You have nowhere to run now, only
up.
19221.name: Carrion Crawler Lair

description: The close knit brush and plants entangle your feet as you wade through
the forest.  The twisted trees have grown close to each other, making it
difficult to traverse the forest.  The canopy offers no help as it blocks
out all the daylight that might lead your way.
19361.name: Overgrown Forest

description: You wander deeper through this mangled carcass that was once a forest.
Great trees have been uprooted, some snapped in half even.  The canopy that
kept the forest so dark is nothing more than a few empty branches.  The sky
overhead is {8overcast{0 with dark storm clouds.  {#Lightning{0 arcs across
the sky and to the ground.  As you walk your feet sink into the charred
earth, which has turned to mud from the constant {^r{7a{^i{7n{0 from above.
19373.name: Barren Forest

description: You suddenly find yourself in an area of death and decay.  Mangled,
decayed bodies are scattered about and bones with chunks of flesh
still attached lie in piles.  The rancid smell of death is prominent,
making you sick to your stomach.  A shimmering globe hovers above the
center of the decaying mass.
19245.name: Realm of the Demon Lord of Death

description: You can no longer wade through the water with ease.  It is almost up to
your shoulders and to continue any further would mean your own suicide.  The
eerieness of this place is enough to make any normal person flee for their
lives.  Obviously you seek something here, perhaps something you can't have.
19263.name: Deepest, Darkest Swamp

description: You walk into a small clearing.  On the north side of the clearing is a
small pool of black water.  The grass here is quite black, almost
nonexistant, just a muddy dirt clearing surrounded by black twisted trees.
19303.name: Small Clearing

description: You wander deeper through this mangled carcass that was once a forest.
Great trees have been uprooted, some snapped in half even.  The canopy that
kept the forest so dark is nothing more than a few empty branches.  The sky
overhead is {8overcast{0 with dark storm clouds.  {#Lightning{0 arcs across
the sky and to the ground.  As you walk your feet sink into the charred
earth, which has turned to mud from the constant {^r{7a{^i{7n{0 from above.
19378.name: Barren Forest

description: You stand in the middle of a raging ice storm.  Strong winds pelt
you with chunks of ice, painfully stinging your face.  It is quite
hard to travel through the knee deep snow and ice.  Your vision is
blinded by the swirling snow and frozen rain limiting your vision to
mere inches.  The subarctic temperatures begin to set into your bones,
slowing your progress.
19236.name: Realm of the Demon Lord of Frost

description: This room is lit only by the light you carry.  The walls are covered with
cobwebs and the floors are cover with dust.  Small insects crawl about, and
the place smells of death.
19224.name: A {rTomb {xof the {yD{8ea{yd{x

description: This room is lit only by the light you carry.  The walls are covered with
cobwebs and the floors are cover with dust.  Small insects crawl about, and
the place smells of death.
19225.name: A {rTomb {xof the {yD{8ea{yd{x

description: This room is lit only by the light you carry.  The walls are covered with
cobwebs and the floors are cover with dust.  Small insects crawl about, and
the place smells of death.
19228.name: A {rTomb {xof the {yD{8ea{yd{x

description: There is no path here.  Only travelling through thick bushes and
plantlife.  The corrupted trees reach far into the air, ending in a
intertwined canopy of branches, effectively keeping out the light from
above.  A thick smell of mildew floats past your nose, making you sneeze.
19359.name: Overgrown Forest

description: This small trail continues on through tightly packed trees and heavy
overgrowth of brush and briars.  The trail is so small you almost lose it a
couple times and veer off into a patch of thorn bushes.  Small burrs have
stuck to your clothing as you've travelled through here.
19344.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: The animal trail continues north and east here.  The forest is quite
thick and you are constantly moving large brush out of your way.  You keep
asking yourself what you are doing stumbling through this treacherous area.
19339.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: The closeness of the large trees here makes it quite hard to traverse
with any haste whatsoever.  Even the slightest bit of carelessness could
cause you to lose your footing, or worse, your bearings.  The closed canopy
above adds to the danger, quenching out any daylight that might help you
find your way.
19364.name: Overgrown Forest

description: The grove has begun to thin out, opening up to face the great cathedral
before you.  You stare at the mammoth complex in awe, wondering what force
could have created such raw {!Be{3au{!ty{0.  An {8evil {!be{#au{!ty{0, but still awe inspiring.
19319.name: {8Grove Of {4D{$e{8s{3t{#r{7u{#c{3t{8i{$o{4n{0

description: You stand surrounded by fire and heat of all kinds.  Lava pumps
from small craters in the ground, oozing in all directions.  Jets of
searing flame spew forth randomly, sending bursts of fire everywhere.
The ground beneath your feet is cracked and dry.  The heat is
unbearable and you begin to feel a bit dizzy.
19232.name: Realm of the Demon Lord of Fire

description: Here the path is almost nonexistant.  The thick overgrowth has all but
totally covered the path.  Broken, rotted trees lie across the path and make
it hard to pass through.  As you head north it can only get worse.
19311.name: Dark and Twisted Path

description: This room is lit only by the light you carry.  The walls are covered with
cobwebs and the floors are cover with dust.  Small insects crawl about, and
the place smells of death.
19222.name: A {rTomb {xof the {yD{8ea{yd{x

description: This room is lit only by the light you carry.  The walls are covered with
cobwebs and the floors are cover with dust.  Small insects crawl about, and
the place smells of death.
19227.name: A {rTomb {xof the {yD{8ea{yd{x

description: Besides the broken pews and hunks of ceiling here, it seems some animal
has made its home here.  There is a small hole burrowed into the ground, but
it is too dark to make anything out in it.  It could be nothing, but I would
watch my step.
19205.name: Hall of Ceremonies

description: Before you lies a large, stone door, which looks to have not been moved
in years.  It is covered in cobwebs and dust.  A symbol of death marks the
door, leading you to believe that something dead....  Or maybe undead lies
beyond this door.
19216.name: End of the Corridor

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Kemev the Bastard{0
{6Ruthless Leader of Assassins{0
19324.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: You have stumbled upon a rather large stump.  It is covered with moss and
fungus, and has turned black through the ages.  It sits surrounded by nasty
briar patches and fallen trees.  Rotted logs and dead grass lie about
everywhere.
19314.name: Twisted Black Forest

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Greythorn Umberbush{0
19326.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: This stone room is an ancient and long forgotten place. Forgotten for
a good reason. The tortured souls of long dead priests fly about this
room, trapped for all eternity, damned for the rest of their existence.
The pitiful wails and pleas of the souls almost brings you to tears.
"Please free us from this damnation. If you cannot kill us then you will
join in our misery! "
19251.name: Chamber of Souls

description: The forest here is quite thick, and it takes quite a bit of effort to get
anywhere travelling through this forest area.  It seems there is a small
opening east of here, but what it leads to only the gods above know.
19351.name: Thick Overgrown Forest

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Carnilla the Slut{0
19329.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: This is the center of the hall, and is cluttered with the most rubble.
It seems the ceiling has fallen away the most here and there is a good pile
of mortar and broken pews.  The altar is directly north on a dais, and the
seems to be a hallway branching off this hall to the east.  To the south is
the Entrance Hall.
19207.name: Hall of Ceremonies

description: From here the path twists northward, heading deeper into the forest.  It
could be daytime, or it could be night, you couldn't tell if you wanted to.
The canopy above is so twitsed and meshed together it blocks out all of the
outside world.  There is no help here, only fear and chaos.
19308.name: Dark and Twisted Path

description: The animal trail passes through a thick overgrowth here, and you can't
tell which way it heads from here.  It looks as if something has passed
through here recently, but you can be none too sure.
19348.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: You wander deeper through this mangled carcass that was once a forest.
Great trees have been uprooted, some snapped in half even.  The canopy that
kept the forest so dark is nothing more than a few empty branches.  The sky
overhead is {8overcast{0 with dark storm clouds.  {#Lightning{0 arcs across
the sky and to the ground.  As you walk your feet sink into the charred
earth, which has turned to mud from the constant {^r{7a{^i{7n{0 from above.
19379.name: Barren Forest

description: You stand in the middle of a vast desolate wasteland.  Sky above
you is a shade of gray, extending in all directions, never changing
color.  The ground beneath you is a slightly darker shade of gray,
extending in all directions, never changing color.
19244.name: Realm of the Demon Lord of Death

description: You continue further into the cave.  The light from the cave opening has
long disappeared behind you.  The cave reeks of mildew and mold, often
making you sneeze.
19376.name: Deeper Within A Small Cave

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Lietric the Lunatic{0
19328.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: You have entered a barren and ravaged forest.  Great trees have been
uprooted, some snapped in half even.  The canopy that kept the forest so
dark is nothing more than a few empty branches.  The sky overhead is
{8overcast{0 with dark storm clouds.  {#Lightning{0 arcs across the sky and
to the ground.  As you walk your feet sink into the charred earth, which has
turned to mud from the constant {^r{7a{^i{7n{0 from above.
19366.name: Barren Forest

description: You are having trouble staying on the trail, and find yourself veering
off more than once.  But the pricking of thorn bushes quickly puts you back
on the right track.  You are already thinking of a nice inn room and a
frothy mug of ale.
19341.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: You wander deeper through this mangled carcass that was once a forest.
Great trees have been uprooted, some snapped in half even.  The canopy that
kept the forest so dark is nothing more than a few empty branches.  The sky
overhead is {8overcast{0 with dark storm clouds.  {#Lightning{0 arcs across
the sky and to the ground.  As you walk your feet sink into the charred
earth, which has turned to mud from the constant {^r{7a{^i{7n{0 from above.
19369.name: Barren Forest

description: There is nothing in this corner of the hall, besides splinters from
shattered pews and chunks of ceiling which has fallen to the floor here.
19206.name: Hall of Ceremonies

description: This stump is home to Gunderwilp the Finger.  He will sell anything, even
his own body parts, for a profit.  Don't expect a bargain here, nor top
quality.  It's best not to expect too much from Gunderwilp.  His home is
lightly decorated with a few chairs, a table, and a bed in the corner.
Whatever he does for entertainment he doesn't do here, there just wouldn't
be any room.  There is hardly enough to move around as it is.
19315.name: Home of Gunderwilp the Finger

description: Now you stand before the stairs of the cathedral.  Great marble pillars
line the front of the building.  The {4s{8t{#o{8r{4m{0 rages on overhead,
lighting the place up from time to time with wonderful displays of
{#l{7i{#g{7h{#t{7n{#i{7n{#g {0arcs.  The marble stairs extend upward toward
the front of the cathedral, beckoning all who follow the {$L{8o{#r{$d {8of
19337.name: {8Path Of {4D{$e{8s{3t{#r{7u{#c{3t{8i{$o{4n{0

description: This stone room is an ancient and long forgotten place. Forgotten for
a good reason. The tortured souls of long dead priests fly about this
room, trapped for all eternity, damned for the rest of their existence.
The pitiful wails and pleas of the souls almost brings you to tears.
"Please free us from this damnation. If you cannot kill us then you will
join in our misery! "
19256.name: Chamber of Souls

description: You stand in small clearing.  It is nothing more than a dry patch of mud
surrounded by some broken and mangled trees.  Lying on the east side of the
clearing is a pool of black water.
19310.name: Small Clearing

description: You find yourself standing in a raging hurricane.  Lightning
crashes all around you, sending sparks of electricity shooting in all
directions.  The claps of thunder are deafening, leaving you unable to
hear for several seconds.  The rain is coming down in sheets,
drenching you to the bone.  You have all you can do to keep yourself
from getting sucked away by the extreme winds.
19240.name: Realm of the Demon of Lightning

description: You have travelled deeper into the swamp, seeing only swamp ahead of you,
and swamp behind you.  You are quite soaked with swamp water, which is very
cold and slimy.  Leeches have found their way into your clothing and armor.
You are quite unconfortable being here.
19305.name: Murky, Black Swamp

description: The humongous trees have grown close together in this part of the forest.
Their branches interwine to form a canopy that allows only minute amounts of
light to enter.  Branches and twigs snap as you wade through deep growths of
ferns and thorn bushes.
19365.name: Overgrown Forest

description: The forest here is quite overgrown and the brush is quite thick.  It is
quite hard to manuever through the amount of brush.  Adding to your
difficulties is the fact that there is little to no light to guide your way.
19354.name: Thick Overgrown Forest

description: This stone room is an ancient and long forgotten place.  Forgotten for a good reason.  The tortured souls of long dead priests fly about this room, trapped for all eternity, damned for the rest of their existence.  The pitiful wails
and pleas of the souls almost brings you to tears.  "Please free us from this damnation.  If you cannot kill us then you will join in our misery!"
19254.name: Chamber Of Souls

description: Behind this tapestry is a small niche.  What possibly possessed you to
come back here?
19203.name: Behind the Tapestry

description: You have entered a small cave.  It isn't all that big, perhaps 10 feet
from side to side.  Your nose cringes at the smell of mildew and mold.
19374.name: A Small Cave

description: The broken path grows narrower and narrower until it is almost
nonexistent.  Prickly bushes and vines scratch at you and rotted trees hang
towards you.
19312.name: Dark and Twisted Path

description: You wander deeper through this mangled carcass that was once a forest.
Great trees have been uprooted, some snapped in half even.  The canopy that
kept the forest so dark is nothing more than a few empty branches.  The sky
overhead is {8overcast{0 with dark storm clouds.  {#Lightning{0 arcs across
the sky and to the ground.  As you walk your feet sink into the charred
earth, which has turned to mud from the constant {^r{7a{^i{7n{0 from above.
19368.name: Barren Forest

description: You have entered a barren and ravaged forest.  Great trees have been
uprooted, some snapped in half even.  The canopy that kept the forest so
dark is nothing more than a few empty branches.  The sky overhead is
{8overcast{0 with dark storm clouds.  {#Lightning{0 arcs across the sky and
to the ground.  As you walk your feet sink into the charred earth, which has
turned to mud from the constant {^r{7a{^i{7n{0 from above.
19371.name: Barren Forest

description: A rotted elm tree has snapped and is now laying across the path.  It
smells quite putrid here, and the air is dry.  The sun is just a foggy haze
overhead.
19301.name: Dark and Twisted Path

description: The brush and trees around the trail here have become much more thick and
much more unnavigatable.  Matter of fact, the overgrowth is so bad you lose
the animal trail you were following.
19343.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: You stand surrounded by fire and heat of all kinds.  Lava pumps
from small craters in the ground, oozing in all directions.  Jets of
searing flame spew forth randomly, sending bursts of fire everywhere.
The ground beneath your feet is cracked and dry.  The heat is
unbearable and you begin to feel a bit dizzy.
19231.name: Realm of the Demon Lord of Fire

description: The grove ends here at a small gate.  The gate is the entrance to a small fenced in area.  The metal sign above the gate reads as follows:
{1C E M E T A R Y{0
You hear noises coming from within, what is making the noises you are unsure of.
19320.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: You have stumbled upon a long forgotten room, with a long forgotten
chest.  The walls here are more dusty and more cobweb-filled than the rest
of the hall.
19229.name: Hall of the Dead

description: The forest you are traveling suddenly changes and deforms before your
eyes.  The once proud oaks are now blackened, gnarled deformitites.  The
grass has turned brown, black and charred in spots.  There are no sounds, no
animals, no insects, nothing.
19300.name: Dark and Twisted Path

description: The forest canopy is keeping all the light out, leaving the forest dark
and musty smelling.  The odor of moss and fungi permeate the air, making it
uncomfortable to breathe.  The brush is overgrown and packed tightly between
the close spaced trees.
19360.name: Overgrown Forest

description: You wander deeper through this mangled carcass that was once a forest.
Great trees have been uprooted, some snapped in half even.  The canopy that
kept the forest so dark is nothing more than a few empty branches.  The sky
overhead is {8overcast{0 with dark storm clouds.  {#Lightning{0 arcs across
the sky and to the ground.  As you walk your feet sink into the charred
earth, which has turned to mud from the constant {^r{7a{^i{7n{0 from above.
19370.name: Barren Forest

description: You can no longer wade through the water with ease.  It is almost up to
your shoulders and to continue any further would mean your own suicide.  The
eerieness of this place is enough to make any normal person flee for their
lives.  Obviously you seek something here, perhaps something you can't have.
19306.name: Deepest, Darkest Swamp

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Archbishop Belphus{0
19322.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: You stand in the middle of a vast desolate wasteland.  Sky above
you is a shade of gray, extending in all directions, never changing
color.  The ground beneath you is a slightly darker shade of gray,
extending in all directions, never changing color.
19243.name: Realm of the Demon Lord of Death

description: The path continues on into a small grove of {8blackened {0trees just
before the cathedral entrance.  The trees look unearthly and most of all
unholy.  They are just bent and twisted in {2un{1tree{2like{0 forms.
19317.name: {8Grove Of {4D{$e{8s{3t{#r{&u{#c{3t{8i{$o{4n{0

description: This is the resting place of Vindigar Bloodmane, a former priest of Tyr.
He is now doomed to the life of a vampire. A life he has been twisted
into by the curse of this foul place.
19258.name: Vindigar Of Blood's Chamber

description: This barren hallway continues onward to who knows what.  This place is
old and falling apart.  You get an uneasy feeling being here, and you feel
more uneasy the deeper you travel into this accursed place.
19214.name: Empty Hallway

description: You warily pass through the {1rusted{0 iron gate and continue down the
path towards the giant cathedral.  The clouds overhead are dark and
{8gray{0.  Small arcs of {#lightning{0 dot the dark sky, accompanied by an
occasional clap of thunder.  A small drizzle of {$rain{0 soak the region,
including you.
19316.name: {8Path to {4D{$e{8s{3t{#r{&u{#c{3t{8i{$o{4n{0

description: You travel deeper with the cave, looking for what you are not sure.  The
smell of musty mildew-covered walls permeates the air, and gives you a
feeling of nausea.
19375.name: Deeper Within A Small Cave

description: The animal trail continues on here, through overgrowth and around large
trees.  It is quite dark around here, and this path has not been lit very
much at all.
19349.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: The trail here seems to close in, and the darkness helps none in finding
your way.  Some thick briars surround the trail and you get scraped and cut
finding your way down this little trail.
19346.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6An Unfortunate Heathen{0
19327.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: The trail here is easy to travel, for a trail traveled by small furry
woodland animals only.  The forest here is still quite dark from a canopy of
thick oak trees.
19340.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: You have stumbled upon the eye of the hurricane.  In a radius of 10
feet around you it is totally calm.  Beyond that circle the hurricane
rages on, sending arcs of electricity in all directions.  The claps of
thunder are still deafening, but the lightning stays withing the
hurricane clouds.  A shimmering sphere hovers just above you.
19241.name: Realm of the Demon of Lightning

description: You are on the east side of the hall, which doesn't have much ceiling
rubble, but a couple of pews have been piled up here.  The pile of splinters
from the pews sorta blocks the way down the hallway to the east.  Hopefully
the pews were piled to block the way in, and not to keep something out.
Because if it was made to hold something back, it didn't work because you
find it easy to get into the hallway.
19208.name: Hall of Ceremonies

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Phung the Ox{0
19331.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: The forest around here is thick and overgrown.  The canopy of oak
branches and leaves above keeps out all but the tiniest bit of light.
19353.name: Thick Overgrown Forest

description: You find yourself standing in a raging hurricane.  Lightning
crashes all around you, sending sparks of electricity shooting in all
directions.  The claps of thunder are deafening, leaving you unable to
hear for several seconds.  The rain is coming down in sheets,
drenching you to the bone.  You have all you can do to keep yourself
from getting sucked away by the extreme winds.
19238.name: Realm of the Demon of Lightning

description: This is the chamber in which the Soulmaster resides.  It is a barren room.  Only bare stone walls stare at you as you look around.
19255.name: The Soulmaster's Chamber

description: The forest is quite dark and it is hard to travel freely through this
area.  The bushes are thick and the large oak trees squeeze out all the
light from where you stand.  Have fun wading through this shit.
19352.name: Thick Overgrown Forest

description: The stone corridor continues onward.  You leave footprints in the dust as
you walk on.  Torches continue to dimly light your way.  An alcove lies on
your left and right, but seems to dark to see anything inside.
19218.name: The {mHall {xof the {yD{8ea{yd{x

description: Here is where the funerals and ceremonies of the dead were preformed.
Any chosen high priest could preform a ceremony here, for originally all the
Gods of the Realms blessed this crypt.  But now the altar is cracked, and
the tapestry behind the altar is faded and torn, not legible any longer.
The dais you stand on is not in good shape either.  It is broken and
cracked, and pebbles of stone roll and grind under your feet and you walk.
19210.name: Altar of Ceremonies

description: The stone corridor continues here. Strange arcanic symbols line the walls.
Torches dimly illuminate the cold, stone walls. An alcove lies to the
east and west too dark to see any detail, while to the south lies a dimly
lit alcove area.
19226.name: The {mHall {xof the {yD{8ea{yd{x

description: You have entered a barren and ravaged forest.  Great trees have been
uprooted, some snapped in half even.  The canopy that kept the forest so
dark is nothing more than a few empty branches.  The sky overhead is
{8overcast{0 with dark storm clouds.  {#Lightning{0 arcs across the sky and
to the ground.  As you walk your feet sink into the charred earth, which has
turned to mud from the constant {^r{7a{^i{7n{0 from above.
19372.name: Barren Forest

description: The stone corridor continues onward.  The dust and cobwebs are endless,
and tiny insect crawl about.  Torches continue to dimly light your way.  An
alcove lies on your left and right, but seems to dark to see anything
inside.
19223.name: The {mHall {xof the {yD{8ea{yd{x

description: This stone room is an ancient and long forgotten place.  Forgotten for a good reason.  The tortured souls of long dead priests fly about this room, trapped for all eternity, damned for the rest of their existence.  The pitiful wails
and pleas of the souls almost brings you to tears.  "Please free us from this damnation.  If you cannot kill us then you will join in our misery!"
19253.name: Chamber Of Souls

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Princess Yanalda{0
19332.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Wilquanis Broadleaf{0
19330.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: This room is where Vindigar sleeps when he has nothing better to do.
But if you are here, that means he won't be needing this coffin anymore.
19260.name: The Coffin of Vindigar

description: Before you stands the bloody crypt. A holy burial ground for priests
and clerics of the realms. All holy men and women of any God can wish
to be buried here upon demise. Recently a priest and a cleric of {%C{8y{5r{8i{%c{7,
the {5Prince {8of {%L{8i{5e{%s{7, and a priest and a cleric of {4T{8a{#l{8o{4s{7, the {4S{8t{#o{8r{4m L{8o{#r{4d{7
joined forces and decided to curse this holy place, as homage to their
respected Gods. Seeing this great act of love for their Gods, {%C{8y{5r{8i{%c{7 and
{4T{8a{#l{8o{4s{7 channelled a very minute amount of power through their followers
giving them the power they needed for this incantation. The incantation
was completed and in turn cursed this holy place, twisting and deforming
all within. No one dares enter anymore nor do any of the holy get buried
here. This is a horribly cursed place, and only the damned shall ever
reside here. Be warned, none have exited alive.
19200.name: The {rBl{Roo{rdy {8Crypt{x

description: Here it is much the same as the previous frozen wasteland.  The
raging blizzard has not let up a bit, and the temperature remains
below freezing.  Fortunately you have stumbled upon a small frozen
cavern.  The ice-covered cave still does not totally shelter you from
the storm.  A shimmering sphere floats at the ceiling of the cave.
19237.name: Realm of the Demon Lord of Frost

description: The brush here is quite more overgrown than the rest of the forest you
have encountered. It is still quite dark under the forest's canopy and
you are having trouble finding your way. An overgrown stone faced structure
stands to the north.
19355.name: Thick Overgrown Forest

description: The path this way ends shortly in large stone well with a few old, rotted
benches.  The area is actually pretty sheltered from the {4S{8t{#o{8r{4m{0
above.  You feel rather safe and secure, about as safe as one can feel
amongst great {8evil{0.
19321.name: {8Grove Of {4D{$e{8s{3t{#r{&u{#c{3t{8i{$o{4n{0

description: You find yourself standing on a large rock plateau.  Then you
notice that the plateau is not attached to anything.  You are standing
on a chunk of rock that is floating around an endless void.  On the
far edge of the plateau is a small shimmering portal, leading to
anywhere.
19246.name: Home of the Demon Knight of Chaos

description: This small crypt has long been devoid of whatever or whomever
rested here.  The sarcophagus that rested in the room is now nothing
more than a pile of rubble.  The room is well lit by a strange glowing
{^aura{0 straight ahead.
19384.name: An Abandoned Crypt

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Phallus{0
19325.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: Your journey ends here.
Nothing but death awaits those who are foolish enough
to journey down into the Crypts of Destruction.
{x
The immortals decree this site among the most dangerous
in all the realms.  Venture further only at your own
risk.  No reimbursement or compensation will be given.
The corridor ends abruptly here at a defiled altar once used to venerate
the dead in respect and honor. Strange arcane symbols adorn the base
of the altar, unreadable yet decisively evil in their intent. The torches
along the walls flicker with some strange breeze that seems to come from
out of nowhere. {x
Across the southern wall is an {8inscription{x written in a language you
can understand.
19262.name: {BA{8l{Bt{8a{Br{x of the {yU{mn{8dyi{mn{yg{x

description: You find yourself standing in a raging hurricane.  Lightning
crashes all around you, sending sparks of electricity shooting in all
directions.  The claps of thunder are deafening, leaving you unable to
hear for several seconds.  The rain is coming down in sheets,
drenching you to the bone.  You have all you can do to keep yourself
from getting sucked away by the extreme winds.
19239.name: Realm of the Demon of Lightning

description: The small animal trail continues on through the thick forest.  It gets
alittle darker through here, and you are having some trouble staying on the
path due to the lack of good light.
19356.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: It seems the path here has been travelled more to the east than the
north.  North the path begins to get thinner and the overgrowth of thorn
bushes and rotted trees gets thicker.  As where the path eastward seems that
is might open up into a small clearing or something.
19309.name: Dark and Twisted Path

description: The smell of wet dirt and moss fills the air, adding to the creepiness of
this forest.  No light penetrates the canopy above, and many unseen thorns
and burrs cut and scratch you as you tread through the overgrowth of bushes.
Your feet sink a bit in the wet earth, leaving deep footprints in your wake.
19363.name: Overgrown Forest

description: Long ago this room was used to prepare the dead before being buried within
this once holy place. This may be the only room that has any sanctity
remaining in this entire place.
19259.name: Chamber Of Mending

description: The trail continues through a less heavy part of the forest.  It is still
thick enough to allow no light, but the trail is easier to manuever.  You
think you hear something off in the woods, but it could be your imagination.
19357.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: You are now stumbling through nasty sharp briar patches, which poke you
with needles, or leave a bur on your clothing.  It is quite dark in this
part of the woods, and who in the nine hells knows what could be lurking in
this cursed forest.
19302.name: Deep Overgrown Brush

description: You are standing before a shimmering hole of light.  It seems to be
some sort of portal, but to where it could lead you have no idea.
Home?  Another demon's home?  There is only one way to find out.
19247.name: Home of the Demon Knight of Chaos

description: You trudge through the pool and into a murky swamp.  Slime and fungus
float on the water surface.  A putrid smell exudes from the area, seeping
into your clothes and hair.  The waist deep water penetrates your clothing,
making you thoroughly soaked.
19304.name: Murky, Black Swamp

description: You have travelled far into this cave.  The way in was left far,
far behind you.  Where could this cave lead to anyway.  You guess
there is only one way to find out.  (thank Eron for the change of
location)
19377.name: Deeper Within A Small Cave

description: This huge room was once a holy place where the ceremony of the dead was
preformed on new inhabitants in the crypt.  It was beautifully decorated
with tile designs, that are now flaking away revealing mold and moss.  Rows
of pews lie broken and strewn across the room.  The floor tiles have been
upheaved and vines have begun to sprout from where they were.
19204.name: Hall of Ceremonies

description: You continue clawing your way through the briars to find a small animal
path running through here.  The trail isn't that wide, and it must be used
by smaller animals.  It is still quite dark in this part of the woods.
19338.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: You are on a dais, directly west of the altar.  Priest and holy men stood
here during religious ceremonies, but to stand here too long will only get
you a lump on your head from the falling ceiling.
19212.name: Dais in the Hall of Ceremonies

description: Before you is the largest structure you've ever seen this deep in any
woodland area.  The dark marble walls and pillars give off a shady glow.  A
semi-rusted gate lies before you, beginning the path to the marble
cathedral.
19313.name: Before the Gates of Destruction

description: This stone room is an ancient and long forgotten place. Forgotten for
a good reason. The tortured souls of long dead priests fly about this
room, trapped for all eternity, damned for the rest of their existence.
The pitiful wails and pleas of the souls almost brings you to tears.
"Please free us from this damnation. If you cannot kill us then you will
join in our misery! "
19250.name: Chamber of Souls

description: The trail here seems quite easy to find, even though the forest is still
quite thick and dark.  Something scurries into the bushes near you, but it
couldn't be more than a squirrel or badger.
19358.name: A Small Animal Trail

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Father Anarkis{0
19333.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: You are on a dais, directly east of the altar.  Priest and holy men stood
here during religious ceremonies, but to stand here too long will only get
you a lump on your head from the falling ceiling.
19211.name: Dais in the Hall of Ceremonies

description: This room is lit only by the light you carry.  The walls are covered with
cobwebs and the floors are cover with dust.  Small insects crawl about, and
the place smells of death.
19220.name: A {rTomb {xof the {yD{8ea{yd{x

description: The path continues on through the grove and towards the cathedral.  It
also now has branches to the left and to the right, seeming to go to the
sides of the {8dark{0 building.  The grove provides little shelter from the
ongoing {4s{8t{#o{8r{4m{0 raging above your head.
19318.name: {8Grove Of {4D{$e{8s{3t{#r{&u{#c{3t{8i{$o{4n{0

description: Here lies a tombstone etched with the name:
{6Ebenix the Lich Lord{0
{6Ruler of Undead{0
19336.name: {1Cemetary {8Of {2C{^h{2a{^o{2s{0

description: This large open room is decorated plainly with a tapestry of a bloody
corpse-filled battlefield to the east, and a tapestry depicting a religious
ceremony to the west.  A statue of Kelemvor, The God of the Dead, rests in
the middle of the room in honor of the dead buried within this holy crypt.
19201.name: Entrance Hall

description: The trees in this area all bear long claw-like scars and char marks on
their trunks.  The brush has been cleared by what seems to be a small forest
fire.  The canopy above still lets no light to the bottom of the forest.
19362.name: Black and Charred Forest

description: This stone room is an ancient and long forgotten place. Forgotten for
a good reason. The tortured souls of long dead priests fly about this
room, trapped for all eternity, damned for the rest of their existence.
The pitiful wails and pleas of the souls almost brings you to tears.
"Please free us from this damnation. If you cannot kill us then you will
join in our misery! "
19257.name: Chamber Of Souls

description: You continue your trek climbing down the large hole.  You still cannot
see what is below you, but you sense that the bottom cannot be too far away.
Water runs down the walls, making gripping the walls hard and your climb
slow and tedious.
19381.name: A Large Dirt Hole

description: You continue onwards down this abandoned hallway wondering what dangers
could lie ahead, what possibly could still survive in this wretched place?
19215.name: Empty Hallway

description: The broken path continues on, curving to the west.  A strange feeling
sends chills up your spine.  It seems like someone is watching you, but when
you turn around there is no one in sight.  Maybe the trees are so crooked
and deformed they are playing tricks on your mind, making you believe they
are real.  Then again, maybe not.
19307.name: Dark and Twisted Path

description:
You are staring in awe at a 15 foot tall stone statue, that isn't really a statue, but a magical creature bent on upholding his creator's wishes.
To stand in his way is to surely face doom.
19200.room_name: A large, stone statue stands here shaped like a huge man wearing plate armor.
19200.name: Stone Golem~
subroutines: M grall 19200 100~

description:
You are revolted by the mere sight of this huge beast...or whatever it is.  It's whole body is made of strips and patches of flesh sewn together.
It reeks of death, and that may be the last thing you ever smell.
19201.room_name: Here stands a large humanoid made of sewn together patches of flesh.
19201.name: Flesh Golem~

19202.room_name: A many leg centipede with eight tentacles off its mandibles leaps to attack.
19202.name: Carrion Crawler~

description: Brains!  Brains!  Brains for breakfast!  Brains for lunch!  Brains at every single meal!  Why can't we have some brains!?!  Brains!  Brains!
19203.room_name: A decaying zombie stiffly moves to eat your brain.
19203.name: A Zombie~

description: A hulking skeleton is what you are looking at. Large enough to be the skeletal remains of an ogre or maybe an umberhulk.
19204.room_name: An 8-foot tall skeletal creature is lumbering towards you.
19204.name: A Giant Skeleton~

description: A rotted mummy stands here kicking your ass.
19205.room_name: A stiff-armed, cloth-wrapped mummy busting some ass.
19205.name: {8A Rotted Mummy{0~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCGHIJK
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19205 100~

description: Theres not much to tell about the ghost.  He's almost too transparent to make out any details on him.
19206.room_name: A vague, transparent form hovers here, looking for a victim to feed off of.
19206.name: A Ghost~
subroutines:
F for AMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
Your gaze falls upon Nyxteldizle, Demon Lord of Fire.  He looks
much like a giant, well-muscled human, save for the massive flames
engulfing his entire body.  He swings wildly with flaming fists,
looking to end your pitiful existence.
19207.name: {8The {2D{!e{2m{!o{2n {8of {!F{#ir{!e{0~
subroutines:
F for AHV
F par DEF
M fight 19207 3~

description:
You are looking at Vindiousan, Demon Lord of Frost.  He looks much
like a giant, well_muscled human, save for his blue skin and the frost
that covers most of his body.  He charges forth with icy fist blazing,
looking to punish you for disturbing him.
19208.name: {8The {2D{!e{2m{!o{2n {8of {^Fr{Bo{^st{0~
subroutines:
F for AHV
F par DEF
M fight 19208 3~

description:
Before you stands Hindsteedge, Demon Lord of Lightning.  He looks
much like a giant, well-muscled human, save for the sparks of
electricity jumping from his flesh.  He readies his
electricity-charged fists in front of him, preparing to give you the
shock of your life.
19209.room_name: A {8gigantic {2d{!e{2m{!o{2n{0 surging with {Bel{8ect{#r{8ici{Bty{0 flies towards you {8angrily{0.
19209.name: {8The {2D{!e{2m{!o{2n {8of {BL{8i{#g{&h{#t{&n{#i{8n{Bg{0~
subroutines:
F for AHV
F par DEF
M fight 19209 3~

description:
In front of you hovers Xzyntelizaer, Demon Lord of Death.  He looks
much like a giant, well-muscled human, save for his gray, decaying
flesh.  He slowly raises a finger towards you, willing your death.
19210.name: {8The {2D{!e{2m{!o{2n {8of {!Death{0~
subroutines:
F for AHV
F par DEF
M fight 19210 3~

description:
You find your gaze falling upon the Demon Knight of Chaos.  The
most evil, twisted knight you will ever come across.  Totally devoting
its life to the cause of anarchy and destruction, it roams all levels
of the multiverse, leaving devastation in his wake.  None have been
known to ever defeat the Demon Knight, and it seems even if he was
defeated it is only temporary, for he always returns.
19211.room_name: A huge demon towers over you, garbed as though he was a knight, and levels his spear with intent to kill.
19211.name: {8The {2D{!e{2m{!o{2n {BK{4n{Bi{4g{Bh{4t {8of {!Ch{1a{!os{0~
subroutines:
M death 19219 100~
M fight 19213 3~
M fight 19212 3~
M fight 19211 3~

description: This beast is a servant to the Demon Lord of Fire.  It will protect his land from all intrusions.
19212.room_name: A mass of flames and smoke hovers here, vaguely shaped like some kind of mammoth feline.
19212.name: {8A {!F{#ir{!e {2Beast{0~
subroutines: M fight 19214 25~

description: This beast is a servant of the Demon Lord of Frost. It will protect his land from all intrusions.
19213.room_name: A gigantic canine made of pure ice growls at your presence.
19213.name: {8An {^I{Bc{^e {2Beast{0~
subroutines: M fight 19215 30~

description: This beast is a servant of the Demon Lord of Lighting. It will protect his land from all intrusions.
19214.room_name: A lightning snake slithers here crackling and fizzing with electricity.
19214.name: {8A {4L{Bi{8g{#h{&t{#n{8i{Bn{4g {2Beast{0~

description: This beast is a servant of the Demon Lord of Death.  It will protect his land from all intrusions.
19215.room_name: A shadow of some humanoid form slowly floats in your direction.
19215.name: {8A {!Death {2Beast{0~
subroutines: M fight 19217 30~

19216.d_flags: D Screams '{1THANK YOU!! THANK YOU!! I AM FREE!!!!{6'{0~
description: Free this tortured soul, and only then will you find eternal splendor.
19216.room_name: An essence of a tortured life floats here, pleading to be free.
19216.name: A Tortured Soul~
subroutines:
F for AV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 19221 50~
M fight 19223 25~
M exall 19225 0~
M exall 19225 1~
M exall 19225 2~
M exall 19225 3~
M exall 19225 4~
M exall 19225 5~
19216.t_flags: T Free me from this pain and suffering!  PLEASE!!!~

description:
{0A tall figured garbed in a {8black{0 robe.  You can make out no features.  For
all you can tell the Soulmaster could be nothing more than a {8black{0 robe.
19217.room_name: A figure shrouded by a {8black {0robe hovers here.
19217.name: The Soulmaster~
19217.t_flags: T I will trade my goods...for your soul that is.~

19218.d_flags: D Screams '{1MAY THE GODS OF GOOD BLESS YOU FOR YOUR DEED TODAY!!!!{6'{0~
description: Free this enslaved soul, and perhaps you will be forgiven for your sins.
19218.room_name: An essence of a cursed being floats here, begging for mercy.
19218.name: An Enslaved Soul~
subroutines:
F for AV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 19220 50~
M fight 19224 20~
M exall 19225 0~
M exall 19225 1~
M exall 19225 2~
M exall 19225 3~
M exall 19225 4~
M exall 19225 5~
19218.t_flags: T End this torture that is my life...I BEG OF YOU!!!!~

description: Your eyes gaze upon a once High Priest of Tyr.  But now he is nothing more than and undead visage of his former self.  Definitly don't let this fool you though.  His power is rivaled by few.
19219.room_name: A pale-skinned human stands here with a smear of blood on his face.
19219.name: {1Vi{#nd{3i{#g{1ar {8of {!Blood{0~
subroutines:
M death 19219 100~
M fight 19222 25~
M exall 19225 0~
M exall 19225 1~
M exall 19225 2~
M exall 19225 3~
M exall 19225 4~
M exall 19225 5~
M act 19226 vanishes into a vortexial rift!~

19220.room_name: An invisable specter floats above all here.
19220.name: An invisable specter~
subroutines:
M exall 19225 0~
M exall 19225 1~
M exall 19225 2~
M exall 19225 3~
M exall 19225 4~
M exall 19225 5~
M act 19226 vanishes into a vortexial rift!~

19221.room_name: An invisable specter floats above all here.
19221.name: An invisable specter~
subroutines: M act 19226 vanishes into a vortexial rift!~

19300.name: (no short description)~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description: *wink* Hey are you checking me out *blush* I have a big penis....for a gnome.
19301.room_name: A short gnome stands here, attempting to swindle and deal.
19301.name: {1Gunderwilp {8the {3Finger{0~
subroutines:
M speech 19306 behir~
M grall 19301 100~
M speech 19318 reward~
M speech 19319 take your damn horns~

description:
Once High Priest of Tyr, Belphus was tricked and cursed by Myrkul and doomed to serve his afterlife as a twisted undead zombie.
Luckily Tyr acted upon Myrkul's plot and allowed Belphus to keep his priestly magic.  Not so lucky for any trespassers upon his gravesite.
19302.room_name: A {8black{0 robed figure with {1rotted{0, {3withered{0 flesh is lumbering towards you.
19302.name: {3Arc{#hbis{3hop {2Be{6lph{2us{0~
subroutines:
M random 19320 100~
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19302 100~

description: Eldain was a wild mage, calling on the randomness of magic.  A once faithful of Mystra, he was tricked by Cyric when he was the Lord of the Dead and died a faithless soul.
19303.name: {6El{Bda{6in {8the {!C{#ha{@o{#ti{!c{0~
subroutines:
M random 19320 100~
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19303 100~

description: A once assassin leader, Kemev was the most ruthless assassin in his guild.  He showed great potential in being the best assassin in Calimport........then he met Artemis Entreri.
19304.room_name: A {8black{0 garbed figure is sneaking around you for the easy {!kill{0.
19304.name: {BK{8e{5m{8e{Bv {7the {2Ba{!sta{2rd{0~
subroutines:
M random 19320 100~
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19304 100~

description: The {3yellow{0 skeleton of an umber hulk is what you are staring at.  This undead beast has been magically enchanted to destroy, by the Storm Lord's high priest.
19305.room_name: The skeletal remains of an umber hulk is here mauling you.
19305.name: {!Phallus{0~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFHIJK
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19305 100~

description: This is Gillentalis.  A great wyrm black dragon, powerful enough that most fear this great beast.  The ones who didn't fear him, either never met him or never returned.
19306.room_name: A humongous {8black{0 dragon swoops towards you attempting to tear you apart.
19306.name: {8G{7i{&l{8l{&e{7n{8t{7a{&l{8i{&s {7the {8Great Wyrm{0~
subroutines:
F aff JT
F res H
F vul I
M death 19203 100~

description:
Greythorn was once the mayor of a small hamlet outside of Arabel.  How he
ended up in this cemetary only the Gods above know.
19307.room_name: A naked zombie stumbles towards you with meaning.
19307.name: {8Grey{1thorn {2Um{@b{1erb{@u{2sh{0~
subroutines:
F for A
M random 19320 100~
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19307 100~

description:
The behir is a snake-like reptilian monster whose dozen legs allow it to
move with considerable speed and give it the ability to climb.  It can fold
its limbs close to its long, narrow body and slither in snake-fashion.  The
head looks more crocodilian than snake-like, but has no difficulty in
opening its mouth wide enough to swallow prey whole, the way a snake does. 
The behir has band-like scales of great hardness, which are a deep shade of
blue.  Two large horns curving back over the head look dangerous enough.
19308.room_name: A 40-foot-long snake-like creature, with a dozen legs and a crocodilian head snaps with {2green{0 dripping fangs
19308.name: A Behir~
subroutines:
F aff T
F res BH
F vul I
F par GHP
M death 19228 25~
M fight 19308 3~

description:
This unfortunate non-believer was tortured by Bhaal himself.  His flesh
was stripped from his body, exposing his muscle and bone beneath.  He is
damned to this cemetary, forever punished for not believing.
19309.room_name: A humanoid stands here {!bleeding{0 from showing muscle and sinew.
19309.name: {8A Heathen{0~
subroutines:
M random 19320 100~
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19309 100~

description:
Lietric spent most of his days locked in a prison away until released by
Cyric to spread madness about the lands.  Many unfortunate innocents died at
the hands of this madman.
19310.room_name: A zombie wearing shabby, torn clothing quickly hobbles towards you.
19310.name: {5Lie{8tric {0the {!Lu{#nat{!ic{0~
subroutines:
M random 19320 100~
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19310 100~

description:
Once Carnilla was a bar wench in a fine inn in the city of Waterdeep. 
She saw many late nights with drunken sailors, for a few gold coins of
course.  Unfortunately he untimely death fell into the hands of Cyric as he
was Lord of the Dead.  Her punishment was to live her afterlife on the
Realms, forever to wear a chastity belt.
19311.room_name: A naked human female, with {^pale{0, {1rotting {0flesh and huge breasts reaches to grope you.
19311.name: {^Ca{Brnil{^la {8the {%Slut{0~
subroutines:
M random 19321 69~
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19311 100~

description:
Wilquanis was once a ranger to the Goddess Mielikki, but as the forest
fire raged on around him and his end was near, he abondoned Mielikki for
allowing the forest to burn, with him in it.  Quickly he was sucked in by
Murkyl when he died, and was forced into servitude as a zombie.
19312.room_name: The {8rotted{0, {!bu{#rn{!t{0 carcass of an {2elven{0 ranger points his bow at you.
19312.name: {@Wi{2lq{3u{2an{@is {2Br{1oa{3d{1le{2af{0~

M random 19320 100~
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19312 100~

description:
Phung is the zombie of a 12 foot tall Firbolg giant.  A priest of Talos
raised his body into servitude as a zombie.  The firbolg now rests at his
gravesite, as his master has long met his own doom.
19313.room_name: A giant zombie with {#rippled, {8decaying {1muscles{0 lumbers towards you.
19313.name: {2Phung {8the {3Ox{0~
subroutines:
M random 19320 100~
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19313 100~

description:
Once the princess of a great land in the south, she met her fate
mysteriously.  She was found dead in her room shortly after unknowingly
marrying a Priest of Bhaal.
19314.room_name: A {8decaying{0 female wearing a {3dirty {!red {0dress stands here trying to scare you off.
19314.name: {%Pri{5nce{!ss Y{5ana{%lda{0~
subroutines:
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19314 100~

description:
Anarkis was a devoted priest to the Goddess Talona.  As a gift to Talos
she donated the corpse of Anarkis so that he may further spread her cause in
the afterlife.
19315.room_name: A pale zombie wearing a {8black{0 and {2green{0 robe stands here poised for battle.
19315.name: {3Father {2An{8ark{2is{0~
subroutines:
M random 19320 100~
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19315 100~

description:
Umbarin was a true devotee of Talos.  Though he was not a priest of
Talos, he was a strong believer in the ways of destruction and chaos.  As a
reward for such strong devotion Talos gave him power and allowed him to
reside in the mortal realms as a powerful undead mage.
19316.room_name: A {4cloaked{0 undead humanoid is perched on a tombstone, calling {#l{0i{#g{0h{#t{0n{#i{0n{#g{0 down from the sky.
19316.name: {%Um{!b{^a{!r{%in{8 the {!Wi{%l{^d M{%a{!ge{0~
subroutines:
M random 19320 100~
M exall 19300 100~
M grall 19316 100~

description:
Ebenix resided as a wizard of great reknown and power in the lands of
Faerun.  Upon the making of this cemetary, Velsharoon was sent by Talos to
find someone, or something, to watch over his cemetary.  Velsharoon chose
one of his own liches, Ebenix, to reside as protector to the cemetary.
19317.room_name: A figure of {8rotted {!flesh {0and {3bones{0 stands chanting {^arca{0ne ma{^gics{0 at you.
19317.name: {3E{7b{&e{8n{&i{7x{3 {7t{&h{8e{& {7L{3i{7c{&h{8 L{7o{&r{3d{0~

description:
This is one mangled bear.  It has burnt skin and fur, cuts and scratches
cover its body, and it limps.
19318.room_name: A large brown bear with charred fur and flesh lopes around here.
19318.name: A bear~
subroutines: F off O

description:
This wolf is quite the pitiful sight.  His fur has been matted with
blood, whether it's his or anothers you are not sure.  His paws look well
used, as if he has been running for quite some time.
19319.room_name: A wolf with blood-matted fur cringes away from you.
19319.name: A wolf~
